Decrypting DJI Spark Drone Log Files

DJI Spark Drones have a feature that allows them to transfer files to a computer. Some of these appear to be "black box" encrypted log files. By running and reversing the drone's firmware inside of QEMU, the encryption keys and methods can be determined.
Read More

Analyzing MacOS Malware that Executes a Payload in Memory

This post was inspired by a Twitter post about a piece of MacOS malware created by the Lazarus Group. This malware has a special ability, it can load a Mach-O into memory and then execute it without it ever touching the disk.
